Params: {2: 'Valeria', 3: "We won't make it at this rate!"}
{3: "Valeria grips Yata's hand. Yata then somersaults into the air and flings Valeria away from danger."}
{3: "Then Yata kicks on a nearby wall, hard, and follows Valeria's trail."}
{3: 'The two of them roll into safety.'}
{3: 'Before the Terrapods can catch up to the two of them, they both vanish from the virtual space.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "We couldn't capture the invader. We'll take responsibility for failing the mission."}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'You are the failsafe in case the "invader" flops. If he did not manage to finish the mission, you would have been the ones to follow up and retrieve the data.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "...Tch, guess we're the backup after all, huh."}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "It's all to ensure the mission succeeds.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Let's call him an untested friend for now. That's all I can tell you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Well then, go on and finish the mission. Retrieve the files.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "But we've lost him already, if we have to search for him again..."}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "You don't have to. He should still be in the archives in the Intelligence Agency. There's a set of terminals that can link to Gestalt.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'He should have just disengaged from the immersion. His makeshift terminal should require quite some time to recover from.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "You still have time to intercept him. I'll give you the coordinates.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "Good. No pointless questions. That's what you're best at.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Without a word, Valeria turns and leaves.'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: '(...Not asking questionsâ€”is that really the right thing to do?)'}
